events.message: I received the wrong item in my recent order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible because this is not what I paid for.
The issue has been categorized as a refund request due to the customer receiving the incorrect product.
Customer service representative has been assigned to handle the refund case and assist the customer promptly.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I’m here to help you with your refund request for the incorrect item you received.
Could you please provide your order number and send a photo of the item you received to verify the claim?
My order number is 58791234. I have attached a clear photo showing that the item delivered is different from what I ordered.
Thank you for the information. We can process a full refund for your order immediately or offer an exchange—please let us know your preference.
I would prefer a refund. Please proceed with issuing the refund to my original payment method at your earliest convenience.
The refund has been processed and should appear on your payment method within 3-5 business days. We apologize for the inconvenience caused.
We are following up to confirm that you have received your refund and to ensure you are satisfied with the resolution.
As we have not received any further issues from you, we are closing this refund case. Thank you for your patience and understanding.
